name: Wikipedia - Dark toggle [by Splark]
description: A toggleable Dark mode for users of Style 79374
additional_info: Make sure to install or (re-)enable this style after the main 'light' style to allow it to take priority. Dark-mode overrides are more aggressive attempts at darkening everything, but will sometimes darken things that shouldn't be darkened (like the phylogeny timelines on a species' page).

style_setting_options.label: non-english & special pages
errythang
